quest: This is a quiz about the React library.

Quiz.Question: What are some of the benefits of using React?
What is the purpose of the render method in React?
What does it mean when a component has been rendered?
option: The component's output has been displayed on the screen.
A new instance of that component is created and added to the DOM tree.
An existing component receives updated props from its parent.
When a component is unmounted, any state or data associated with it is destroyed.

Quiz.Question: What are some common use cases for React components?
option: Displaying different views based on user input.
Building a search interface that filters results as the user types.
Implementing drag and drop functionality to reorder elements in a list.
